The
 nutritional management of minor ailments during pregnancy is shown in Table 5-1. 
Table 5-1 Nutritional management of minor ailments during pregnancy 
Conditions Nutritional recommendations 
Constipation • High fibre diet
• Fluids should be increased to 8 to 10 glasses daily (preferably water)
• Exercise 
Haemorrhoids • Treat constipation 
• Kegel exercise
